title: Custom Shopify Theme
subtitle: A Shopify theme from scratch
desc: The theme supports JSON template and Shopify theme editor feature. In this project, I used HTML, CSS, Tailwind, Liquid, Shopify CLI, and Git.

title: Figma UI Kit
subtitle: UI Kit from scratch
desc: I designed and developed this user interface kit completely from scratch. It allows theme customization with the style settings included in the kit.

title: Lainox Web Site
subtitle: A headless Wordpress with Next.js
desc: This is a freelance project. In this project I designed the frontend with React-Next.js. All data is fetched from cms using Rest API. The CMS used is Wordpress. The site has search, filter and pagination features. In this project, I used  React, Next.js, Tailwind, Wordpress, REST API and Git

title: Coffee Shop Website
subtitle: A coffee shop promotional website
desc: The site design was created in Figma. Menu data was fetched from a separate file and displayed. In this project, I used HTML, CSS, React, Next.js, Figma, and Git.
